args: ▷We need to come up with a plan to\nensure our prank on Luca is a success.◁

▷Our target is a master of mischief,
so any old prank isn't going to cut it;
he'll figure it out before we can even
start to pull it off!◁
I concur. So what sort of strategy do you\nthink would work?\n▷Yeah, hmm...◁
▷Sorry. I can't really think of anything.◁\nYou're no help at all, Mascula.
I can't think of any.\n▷Ha! How quickly the worm turns!◁
▷I think this is going to be hard for us\nto manage on our own.◁\nWe require reinforcements.
...Huh? You want to prank Luca back?
Ooooh, I like it! I owe him for like ten\nmillion pranks. I'm not usually a prankster,\nbut it's Halloween and all, so count me in!
Great. You're his sister, so you should\nknow Luca very well. I bet you'll come\nup with an effective strategy.
Yeah, well, much as I'd like to say\n＂okie-doke, leave it to me,＂ I'm a little\nworried about pulling this off.
▷Even though you know Luca well,\ncoming up with a plan will be difficult? ◁

It's BECAUSE I know him so well that it'll
be tough. That blockhead might only be
brilliant at pranks, but he's indisputably
brilliant at them. You get me?
If we come at him with some half-cocked\nprank, he'll see right through it.
▷Yeah, I guess that's true.◁\nOur supposition was correct.
But! It's much too soon to be giving up.\nIf we can't do it alone—or with two or\nthree of us—then we'll just get more!
I'll put word out to the Halidom and gather\nup anyone who can help. Just stay put for\na little bit, 'kay?
You are dependable, Sarisse.\n▷Yeah, I can't wait to see\nwhat you come up with!◁
Mascula, this...\n▷...might have gotten out of hand.◁
I hereby call the first meeting of the\nDunk-On-Luca Committee to order!
▷I'm sort of shocked at the turnout,\nbut also grateful that all these people\nhave come here for us.◁
You better believe I want a chance to\npay Luca back for all his dumb pranks!
Me too! Plus, it's Halloween, so I'm gonna\ndo my best to be a bad kid.

I have little interest in pranks and other
such mischief, but I understand wanting
to get closer to people on Halloween,
which is why I am here.
Then let's get this party rocking and\nmake sure everyone has a great time!
All right, people, let's hear those ideas!\nYou mind taking notes, Sylas?
As I am quite busy with my research,\nI am ONLY helping with planning.\nIs that understood?
Okay, okay! I'll start! What if we tried a\nlittle something like THIS! First, we...
It's not bad, but there is a problem.\nIf this situation were to occur, we...
Oh, right. In that case, what if we revised\nthings to be like...
▷This is great! Everyone's sharing their\nideas and our plan is taking shape.◁
Agreed. Under these conditions, it will\nbe possible to prank Luca back.\n▷And not just that.◁
▷I really feel like something big is\nhappening—something that we couldn't\nhave done with just the two of us.◁
Something big...that the two of us couldn't\nhave predicted or accomplished on our\nown...
(Curious. When I think about it, it makes\nme feel a kind of heat in my heart.)
(It does not feel unpleasant, however. \nJust what IS this sensation?)
And so, the friends of the Halidom lent their\nefforts to the cause, and the details of a plan\nto prank Luca were solidified.
Time for our final checks before putting\nthe plan into action! First?
I'll go to Luca and ask him for help!\nI'll be like, ＂Eek, I saw a fiend!＂
Right. And then when Lowen comes back\nwith Luca in tow, what happens?
Then we fight the fiend! But we make it\nlook like we're in a tough spot and\nabout to lose.
Come on, Althemia. That's not going to\nmake him think, ＂She's in trouble!＂\nYou gotta do it like THIS!
HAAAAALP! THIS FIEND IS GOING TO\nREND ME LIMB FROM LIMB! OH, WHERE\nIS A MIGHTY HERO TO SAVE MEEEEE?!
That's almost frighteningly good, Mym.\nAnyway, once we get to this point,\nit turns out the fiend is actually...

A costume sewn together by Althemia!
▷And we'll be controlling it from above
with a string to make it look like it's
attacking.◁
With roars courtesy of me. I'll do my best\nto sound like a ferocious fiend. Rooooar!
You're making fine use of your experience\npretending to be a zombie!
Anyway, all that is sure to get him in a\npanic to help everyone, which means\nhe'll loose an arrow—and THEN?!
▷The costume will split open and all the\napples inside will come tumbling out!◁\nThis will be our present to Luca.
A prank AND a gift! It's perfect!
All right. If everybody's got the plan\ncommitted to memory, let's begin!
▷We'll be waiting up in the tree, Laxi.◁\nUnderstood. This is important, so I'll\ndouble-check the operation of the costume.
This really came out, didn't it?\nIt looks just like a fiend.
Right?! I'm good at sewing myself,\nbut I can't hold a candle to Althemia.
I can teach you, if you like.
Say, are Lowen and Luca coming?
He only just left to go get him,\nso it seems a little soon yet.
Gya! It's a fiend! A real one, you guys!
We must defeat it quickly, or the entire\nplan will be for nothing.
Wait, Laxi! Leave the fiend to us.\nYou get the prank costume to safety.
But fighting together would defeat\nthe foe more quickly.
This fiend is just like the sugar-loving one\nthat came from the Sweet Retreat,\nwhich means it's after...
